tool_description: Advanced multilingual paraphrasing powered with the 'AI Paraphrasing Multi-Language' API. Rewrite text in various languages while preserving original meaning using cutting-edge AI technology.
name: AI Paraphrasing Multilanguage
title: AI Paraphrasing Multilanguage

api_list.name: Paraphrase
api_list.description: You can use this API to paraphrase/rewrite any article, our API provides you best AI based paraphrasing/rewriting which very powerful and very humanlike...
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-paraphrasing-multilanguage.p.rapidapi.com/api/NLP/Paraphrase"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-paraphrasing-multilanguage.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
